original_title: Over 500 rounds of ammunition, firearm recovered after questioning ‘Kehelbaddara Padme’
original_body_lines: Further questioning by the Western Province North Crimes Division of the arrested underworld figure ‘Kehelbaddara Padme’, has led to the recovery of over 500 rounds of T-56 ammunition, four T-56 magazines, a micro pistol, and other items.
The weapon and ammunition were found concealed near the Peliyagoda Fish Market, the police reported.
